utils

Class FileAssistedJsonAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.JsonAPI
      • utils.FileAssistedJsonAPI

  • public class FileAssistedJsonAPI
extends JsonAPI
    File assisted, requestable JSON API, file assisted when request fails or is throttled

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileAssistedJsonAPI

        public FileAssistedJsonAPI(java.lang.String apiUrl,
                           java.lang.String apiKey,
                           java.nio.file.Path file,
                           int throttleSeconds)
        Parameters:
        apiUrl - URL of the requested API, optionally you can put <APY-KEY> anywhere to replace with the supplied API key. Can be null if you want to disable the API and only use the file
        apiKey - API key which will be replaced into <APY-KEY> (optional but recommended)
        file - File to save the requests into and load result from when throttled
        throttleSeconds - Seconds to wait between requests

      • FileAssistedJsonAPI

        public FileAssistedJsonAPI(java.lang.String apiUrl,

                           java.nio.file.Path file)
        Parameters:

        file - File to save the requests into and load result from when throttled

    • Method Detail

      • requestString

        public java.lang.String requestString()
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      JsonAPI.APIKeyNotFoundException
        Requests the API for a string (may be non JSON)
        Overrides:
        requestString in class JsonAPI
        Returns:
        String of response, it will be read from the file if still throttle still active
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the request failed, see exception for reason
        JsonAPI.APIKeyNotFoundException - The JSON API can't find the API key
